mdRecord.dcterms:title: The organisation of thought, educational and scientific / by A. N. Whitehead
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Whitehead, Alfred North, 1861-1947
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Preface.--I. The aims of education--a plea for reform.--II. Technical education and its relation to science and literature.--III. A polytechnic in war-time.--IV. The mathematical curriculum.--V. The principles of mathematics in relation to elementary teaching.--VI. The organisation of thought.--VII. The anatomy of some scientific ideas.--VIII. Space, time, and relativity.
With one exception, these discourses have been delivered as addresses on various occasions. cf. Pref.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Education
